 2001-19452001-10-250JUS,  ,  ,  , 
PrecisRegulations Amending the CONTRAVENTIONS REGULATIONS by designating, as contraventions, selected offences set out in the following Regulations made under the Canadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999: . - Asbestos Mines and Mills Release Regulations; - Benzene in Gasoline Regulations; - Chlor-Alkali Mercury Release Regulations; - Diesel Fuel Regulations; - Fuels Information Regulations, No. 1; - Gasoline Regulations; - Ozone-depleting Substances Regulations, 1998; - Pulp and Paper Mill Defoamer and Wood Chip Regulations; - Pulp and Paper Mill Effluent Chlorinated Dioxins and Furans Regulations; - Secondary Lead Smelter Release Regulations; - Storage of PCB Material Regulations; and - Vinyl Chloride Release Regulations, 1992. .
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2001-0450 Publication Date: 2001-11-07
